body:
I always see on servers when I go to their staff list the rank Ref.

 But I don't know what it means, can someone tell me what the Rank Ref means?
Is it like a extra rank for MVP players or is it for something else, just tell me it. 

Photo:











Because I have NO idea :D

-Bart (startYOLO)

PS: Here you have the link of what I meant to say: 

http://prntscr.com/77zeji

title: What does the rank Ref means?

replies.body: They will oversee the tournament and make sure the matches are going smoothly.
replies.body_tagged: They will oversee the tournament and make sure the matches are going smoothly.

replies.body: They are referees for the tournament.
replies.body_tagged: They are referees for the tournament.

replies.body:
The word 'Ref' is shortened for 'Referee', and a referee is someone who will be watching over the tournament and the teams whilst being unable to play in it themselves.

EDIT: Ninja'd x2.
replies.body_tagged:
The word 'Ref' is shortened for 'Referee', and a referee is someone who will be watching over the tournament and the teams whilst being unable to play in it themselves.

EDIT: Ninja'd x2.

replies.body: It's possible that you could put referee experience on your staff application, but it must still get accepted and you must still pass the interview like anyone else.
replies.body_tagged: It's possible that you could put referee experience on your staff application, but it must still get accepted and you must still pass the interview like anyone else.
